text:
Paprika, how about that!?
Adds color...!

Meguru, you're just saying things
without thinking about the menu.

Oh, busted.
I can't decide anything, so I'm leaving it up to you...

Of course, I'll help out perfectly on the day!
But, since I'm the assistant, I'll rely on you, Hiori-sensei...!

...Me too.
Please take care of us, Hiori-sensei...!
I'm not a cooking teacher, though.

Yeah, that's true... Well, if it's paprika,
you can make it either Japanese-style or Western-style.

Yay!
Red or yellow, which one do you think?

How about both...?
I think we can make various dishes.

Should we go for it!?
Can we?
